heisig_chinese_memo: To cheat on your exam you roll up your exam paper with your fingers and throw it like a dart out the window.  Your friend catches it outside, fills it out, and throws it back in to you.
Ru_trainchinese: juǎn: (глаг/сущ) скатывать, скручивать; сносить, увлекать; касаться; сверток, рулон
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you roll it up (卷) with your hand (扌) to turn it inside out
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To cheat on your exam you roll up your exam paper with your fingers and throw it like a dart out the window.  Your friend catches it outside, fills it out, and throws it back in to you.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " roll " sound. The original meaning is juanyong and bravery. "Shuowen": "Juan, momentum. From the hand, scroll the sound. "Mandarin" says: "There is courage in the roll." The current edition of "Mandarin" is made "There is courage in boxing", Wei Zhao's note: "Great courage is boxing." " Volume " can pass " fist ", such as "Historical Records. "The Biography of Wu Qi of Sun Tzu," "The man who solves chaos and disputes does not control the volume", Sima Zhensuoyin: "It is said that those who solve the chaos and disputes should be solved with the hand, and the uncontrollable volume should be hit. The volume is the boxing."

" Volume " means to bend the object into a cylindrical shape. This is called " Volume ", and the " Hand " is added afterwards. "Said Wen": "One said: Volume, close." Such as "Huainanzi. "Bing Lue": "A husband's five fingers are more flick, not like one of the hands of a curling hand; ten thousand people are more advanced, not as good as a hundred people." Tang Dynasty Li Bai "Single Father Donglou Qiuye sent his clan brother Shen Zhiqin" : "The rolling curtain sees the moon refreshing. It is suspected that it is snowing in the Yin Shan night."

" Curl " also means to lift, turn over or wrap things up. For example, in the Northern Zhou Dynasty Yuxin's "Poems on Painting Screens": "Jade with pearl curtains, golden hooks and green curtains hanging." Tang Dynasty Lu Zhao's "Hunan Guan Shuangzhezhi Dance Fu": "Holding shock waves and sizzling snow, rolling clouds Ruiyan." Northern Song Su Shi (Jingzhou): "The river invades the plains and the plains are broken, and the wind swirls in the white sand."

" Juan " can also be used as a quantifier, used for things rolled into a tube. For example, the 18th chapter of "The Biography of Sons and Daughters" of Wenkang in the Qing Dynasty: "Suddenly I saw a man standing by the stone of Matai, wearing a rain hat, wearing a golden top covered with pure mud and rust, and wearing a Gebu that had been in the water. A short-breasted robe, a azure feather gauze horse jacket with frayed edges, a pair of broken boots under your feet, a bamboo box and a small roll of matte stone are also placed to cover a baggage." Liu E, "Lao Can" "Travel Notes" Chapter 15: "It's okay if I burn it. You always go blind and burn a roll of Cuihuan's luggage in it. Are you wronged?"
humanum_short_description_en: From " hand " to " roll " sound. The original meaning is juanyong and bravery.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「卷」聲。本義是捲勇、勇武。《說文》：「捲，气勢也。从手，卷聲。《國語》曰：有捲勇。」今本《國語》作「有拳勇」，韋昭注：「大勇為拳。」「捲」可通「拳」，如《史記．孫子吳起列傳》「夫解雜亂紛糾者不控捲」，司馬貞索隱：「謂解雜亂紛糾者，當善以手解之，不可控捲而擊之。捲，即拳也。」

　　「捲」表示把物件彎曲成圓筒狀，本作「卷」，後增「手」旁。《說文》：「一曰：捲，收也。」如《淮南子．兵略》：「夫五指之更彈，不若捲手之一挃；萬人之更進，不如百人之俱至也。」唐代李白〈單父東樓秋夜送族弟沈之秦〉：「捲簾見月清興來，疑是山陰夜中雪。」

　　「捲」也表示將東西掀起、翻過或裹住。如北周庾信〈詠畫屏風詩〉：「玉柙珠簾捲，金鉤翠幔懸。」唐代盧肇〈湖南觀雙柘枝舞賦〉：「擁驚波與急雪，捲祥雲及瑞煙。」北宋蘇軾〈荊州〉：「江侵平野斷，風捲白沙旋。」

　　「捲」還可作量詞，用於捲成筒狀的東西。如清代文康《兒女英雄傳》第18回：「忽見馬臺石邊站著一個人，戴一頂雨纓涼帽，貫著個純泥滿銹的金頂，穿一件下過水的葛布短襟袍子，套一件磨了邊兒的天青羽紗馬褂子，腳下一雙破靴，靠馬臺石還放著一個竹箱兒和小小的一捲鋪蓋一個包袱。」劉鶚《老殘遊記》第15回：「我的燒去也還罷了，總是你瞎倒亂，平白的把翠環的一捲行李也燒在裏頭，你說冤不冤呢？」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「卷」聲。本義是捲勇、勇武。

捲字的基本解释

捲
juǎn
同“卷2”。

捲
quán
古通“拳”，拳头。

捲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juǎn］
［《廣韻》居轉切，上獮，見。］
(1)收；收起。
(2)指某些自然界或人的力量将东西掀起、翻过或裹住。
(3)指搅动或围绕。
(4)裹挟。
(5)将物体弯转成圆弧形或圆筒形。
(6)弯转或裹成圆或圆桶状的东西。
(7)包括全部；尽其所有。
(8)方言。骂。
(9)量词。用于卷成筒形的东西。
[②]［quán］
［《廣韻》巨員切，平仙，羣。］
(1)有气势；勇壮。参见“捲2勇”。
(2)拳头。
(3)屈曲。参见“捲2髮”。
(4)见“捲2捲”。
[③]［juàn］
［《廣韻》居倦切，去線，見。］
古县名有西捲，西汉置。

捲字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　捲； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页435第16
【唐韻】巨員切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】逵員切，?音權。【說文】氣勢也。【齊語】有捲勇股肱之力。【註】人勇爲拳。今本捲作拳。【史記·孫子傳】解雜亂紛糾者不控捲。【註】捲即拳也。　又捲捲，用力貌。【莊子·讓王篇】捲捲乎后之爲人，葆力之士也。【註】自勞貌。　又【說文】一曰捲，收也。　又【唐韻】【廣韻】居轉切【集韻】【正韻】古轉切，?與卷通。斂也。【說文】俗以爲捲舒之捲。【史記·張儀傳】席捲常山之險。【王勃·膝王閣詩】珠簾暮捲西山雨。　又【唐韻】【廣韻】居倦切【集韻】古倦切，?音眷。西捲，縣名。【前漢·地理志】日南郡西捲縣。或作棬。　又【集韻】苦遠切，音綣。搏也。

捲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
捲字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
volume
juǎn
Same as "Volume 2".
volume
quán
Gu Tong "fist", fist.
volume
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juǎn］
["Guangyun" is in turn and cut, go up, see you. ]
(1) Close; put away.
(2) Refers to the lifting, turning or wrapping of things by some natural or human forces.
(3) Refers to stirring or surrounding.
(4) Entrapment.
(5) Turn the object into a circular arc or cylindrical shape.
(6) Things that bend or wrap into a round or barrel shape.
(7) Including everything; doing everything.
(8) Dialects. curse.
(9) Quantifiers. Used for things rolled into a cylindrical shape.
[②]［quán］
["Guangyun" giant cut, flat fairy, group. ]
(1) Vigorous; brave. See "Volume 2 Yong".
(2) Fist.
(3) Buckling. See "Volume 2 Hair".
(4) See "Volume 2".
[③]［juàn］
["Guangyun" is tired and cut, go to the line, see you. ]
The name of the ancient county is Xijuan, which was set in the Western Han Dynasty.
volume

[Note] People are brave for boxing. This volume is a boxing. 【Historical Records·Biography of Sun Tzu】Those who solve chaos and disputes do not control the volume. [Note] Volumes are punches.　Curl again and look hard. [Zhuangzi·Rangwang Chapter] The person who is after the volume is a man, is also a man of Baoli. [Note] Self-employed appearance.　 [Said the text] One said volume, and also closed.　 [Tang Yun] [Guang Yun] Ju Zhuan cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ancient Zhuan cut,? And Juan pass. Converge also. [Speaking of text] It is commonly referred to as the volume of Shuzhuang. [Historical Records · The Biography of Zhang Yi] The danger that swept Changshan. 【Wang Bo·Knee King Pavilion Poems】The bead curtain rolls in the rain in the west.　 [Tang Yun] [Guang Yun] Ju tired cut [Ji Yun] Ancient tired cut,? Sound family. West roll, county name. [Former Han Geography] Xijuan County, Nichinan County. Or make it.　[Jiyun] bitterly and far cut, the sound is 绻. Bo also.
